text: bring you up-to-date on the reports of
the shooting that's taken place at a
Baptist Church there details still
fairly sketchy but police in Texas are
now saying that several people have been
shot by a gunman at a church in the town
of Sutherland Springs and in the last
few moments there's been a little bit
more information as we show you live
pictures of the scene from above the
Baptist Church in Texas a police
commissioner at the scene
in Sutherland Springs has told CBS News
that at least 27 people have died in
that church shooting earlier on there
was a comment from the sheriff Joe
Tackett who told local media that there
had been fatalities in the church and
that the gunman had been as he put it
taken down by police that was in the
last half an hour or so the pictures
were showing you now give you a sense of
the location and of the amount of
activity on the ground
certainly according to other local
reports there has been a heavy police
presence at the scene as you would
imagine in the light of the events
inside that church several ambulances
and several fire engines were at the
scene as well and there were also
reports of people being airlifted from
the scene of that attack so just to
bring you up to date on the latest that
we have at Sutherland Springs in Texas
and this in the last few moments talk of
a Police Commissioner on the ground
saying that at least 27 people have died
in a shooting at a Baptist Church and
we're hoping to bring you more on that
from our correspondent who's following
events in the state in the next little
while but that's the scene live in Texas
as I speak
